mapper.select:
SELECT p.id productId,p.NAME productName,count(*) orderNum,sum(og.number) goodsNum,sum(ob.money_amount) orderAmount, round(sum(ob.money_amount)/count(*),2) orderAverage FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN order_goods og ON ob.order_no = og.order_no AND ob. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5) AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
INNER JOIN product p ON og.product_id = p.id AND p.fuping = 1
AND p.id IN ${whereCondition}
GROUP BY p.id,p. NAME ORDER BY orderNum DESC

SELECT '所有商品' productName, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum7, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 6 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum6, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 5 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum5, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 4 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum4, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum3, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 2 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum2, count(IF(date(ob.create_time)=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),1,NULL)) orderNum1 FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN order_goods og ON ob.order_no = og.order_no AND ob. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5) AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
INNER JOIN product p ON og.product_id = p.id AND p.fuping = 1 GROUP BY '所有商品'

SELECT p.id productId,p.NAME productName FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN order_goods og ON ob.order_no = og.order_no AND ob. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5) INNER JOIN product p ON og.product_id = p.id AND p.fuping = 1 GROUP BY p.id,p. NAME

SELECT date(create_time) statDate,create_ip ip,'D' statDateSpan FROM order_book ob WHERE ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND ob.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} AND ob.status not IN (6,7,8) AND LENGTH(ob.create_ip)>0

SELECT date(o.create_time) statDate,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT o.create_ip) ip,'D' statDateSpan FROM jicai_order o INNER JOIN jicai_order_goods g ON o.order_no = g.jicai_order_no WHERE o.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND o.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND o.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} AND o.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7) AND LENGTH(o.create_ip)>0 AND g.status in(0,2) AND o.order_type = 0 GROUP BY o.order_no

select t.sellerName sellerName,sum(t.orderNum) orderNum,sum(t.orderAmount) orderAmount FROM ( SELECT trim(onlineRetail.seller_name) sellerName,count(*) orderNum,sum(onlineRetail.money_amount) orderAmount FROM ( SELECT ob.order_no ,s.seller_name,ob.money_amount FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN seller s ON ob.seller_id = s.id AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND ob.STATUS NOT IN (6, 7, 8) AND ob.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} INNER JOIN order_goods og ON ob.order_no=og.order_no AND og.product_name NOT LIKE '%国寿丹泉%' GROUP BY ob.order_no ) onlineRetail GROUP BY trim(onlineRetail.seller_name) UNION ALL SELECT trim(onlineJiCai.seller_name) sellerName,count(*) orderNum,sum(onlineJiCai.money_amount) orderAmount FROM ( SELECT jicaio.order_no,s.seller_name,jicaio.money_amount FROM jicai_order jicaio INNER JOIN seller s ON jicaio.seller_id = s.id AND jicaio.order_type = 0 AND jicaio. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7) AND jicaio.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND jicaio.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND jicaio.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} INNER JOIN jicai_order_goods jicaiog ON jicaio.order_no = jicaiog.jicai_order_no AND jicaiog.product_name NOT LIKE '%国寿丹泉%' AND jicaiog. STATUS IN (0, 2) GROUP BY jicaio.order_no ) onlineJiCai GROUP BY trim(onlineJiCai.seller_name) ) t GROUP BY t.sellerName
SELECT seller_name sellerName,area area FROM FUPIN_SELLER_INFO

SELECT date(ob.create_time) statDate,ob.create_ip ip,ma.province_name province FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN member_address ma ON ob.member_address_id = ma.id AND ob.jd_order_id = 0 AND LENGTH(ob.create_ip) > 0 AND ob. STATUS NOT IN (6, 7, 8) AND ob.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
UNION ALL SELECT date(ob.create_time) statDate,ob.create_ip ip,mak.province_name province FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN member_address_kpl mak ON ob.member_address_id = mak.id AND ob.jd_order_id > 0 AND LENGTH(ob.create_ip) > 0 AND ob. STATUS NOT IN (6, 7, 8) AND ob.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
UNION ALL SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT date(jicaio.create_time)) statDate,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT jicaio.create_ip) ip, group_concat(DISTINCT jicaima.province_name) province FROM jicai_order jicaio INNER JOIN jicai_member_address jicaima ON jicaio.address_id = jicaima.id AND LENGTH(jicaio.create_ip) > 0 AND jicaio. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7) AND jicaio.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND jicaio.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND jicaio.seller_id IN ${whereCondition} INNER JOIN jicai_order_goods jicaiog ON jicaio.order_no = jicaiog.jicai_order_no AND jicaiog. STATUS IN (0, 2) GROUP BY jicaio.order_no
SELECT DISTINCT SOURCE source FROM DMP_SELECT.FUPIN_FLOW_STAT
SELECT DISTINCT target target FROM DMP_SELECT.FUPIN_FLOW_STAT
